title: NIT Calicut Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: National Institute of Technology Calicut (NIT Calicut) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Calicut Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
